turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order a Cappuccino from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks, got it. Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks, 4th Street in Colarado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What size, for your Cappuccino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 percent.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of cream would you like for your Grande Cappuccino from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like to know the nutritional facts for your Grande Cappuccino from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. How many calories?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Grande sized Cappuccino from Starbucks has 120 calories.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. How much sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The grande sized Cappuccino from Starbuck has 10g sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. How long is it going to take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Based on traffic and waiting times, approximately 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can't wait that long.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to order your Cappuccino from a closer Starbucks location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which one is closest to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Based on your location which is 112 Street, Colardo Springs, I can place your order at Starbucks on 110 Main Street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thanks.
